metadata.Title: CVE-2020-9497 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: Apache Guacamole 1.1.0 and older do not properly validate datareceived from RDP servers via static virtual channels. If a userconnects to a malicious or compromised RDP server, specially-craftedPDUs could result in disclosure of information within the memory ofthe guacd process handling the connection.

criterions.comment: guacamole-client: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
